description: Ms. codex. Title from text 1. Physical description: 18 lines per page; written in neat naskh in black on machine-made paper. Rubrication and catchwords. First two leaves detached; top edge moldered.
abstract: Collection of texts on a variety of topics.
contents: 1. fol. 2b-133a: Ḥawāshin ʻalá al-sharḥ al-mashhūr li-Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Jurjānī.
2. fol. 134b-179a: Kitāb Nibrās al-ḍiyāʼ / Muḥammad Bāqir ibn Muḥammad Dāmād.
3. fol. 180b-227a: Muqaddimat wājib / Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Khuwānsārī.

title.@value: حواش على الشرح المشهور لتلخيص المفتاح.
Ḥawāshin ʻalá al-sharḥ al-mashhūr li-Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ ... [etc.].

provenance: On leaf 1a, owner's note by Muḥammad Bāqir al-Ḥusaynī dated 1340 H [1921 or 1922].
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Loose in folder consisting of golden-brown leather with blind-tooled fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
